mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jjuproject.tbl_bbs (b_title, b_pw, b_content, b_writer, b_views, b_group, b_step, b_indent ) SELECT #{b_title}, #{b_pw}, #{b_content}, #{b_writer}, 0, max(b_no)+1, 0, 0 FROM jjuproject.tbl_bbs
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM jjuproject.tbl_bbs ORDER BY b_group DESC, b_step ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE jjuproject.tbl_bbs SET b_title = #{b_title} , b_pw = #{b_pw}, b_writer = #{b_writer}, b_content = #{b_content} , b_views = #{b_views} WHERE b_no = #{b_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM jjuproject.tbl_bbs ORDER BY b_group DESC, b_step ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{noOfRecords}
